Html:
Just been playing with GMap... looks pretty cool.

There seems to be one huge oversight though....there are no DependencyProperties on the GMapControl.

I would expect properties like Zoom, MinZoom, MaxZoom and especially CurrentPosition to be defined as DPs so that we can animate them and set them in Blend.

Without them its much harder to do a nice pan/zoom animation... which should be very easy.

i know, originally its windows forms adapted for wpf, but i started new wpf version, you can find it in solution subfolder testing. The hard part is that wpf has no multiscaleimage support ;/ And easiness comes from a lot of job ;}
Zoom and MapType now are DependencyProperties, and you can use function Offset(int x, int y) to pan map programmicaly
